Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 21 Ajjhattattika » 21.1 Paṭiccavāra » 21.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 21.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Aññamaññādi
Ajjhattattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Aññamaññādi
5.
2768Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā…  nissayapaccayā…  upanissayapaccayā…  purejātapaccayā…  āsevanapaccayā (purejātepi āsevanepi paṭisandhi natthi)…  kammapaccayā…  vipākapaccayā…  āhārapaccayā…  indriyapaccayā…  jhānapaccayā…  maggapaccayā…  sampayuttapaccayā…  vippayuttapaccayā…  atthipaccayā…  natthipaccayā…  vigatapaccayā…  avigatapaccayā.
<< Anantarādiup21.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
